si.title: தீப்பந்தப் போராட்டம்
body_lines: කළු ජූලි යාපනය. வடமராட்சி, நெல்லியடி பஸ் நிலையம் முன்பாகத் தீப்பந்தப் போராட்டம் நடைபெற்றது.
ඊයේ රාත්රී 7 ට ශ්රී ලංකා දෙමළ ජාතික සන්ධානය (ටීඑන්ඒ) හි මෙම විරෝධතාවය සිදු කරන ලදී.
ජනාධිපති නීති orney MA හි එම්.ඒ.. (අ)

en.title: Torch struggle
body_lines: Black July Jaffna. The firefall protest was held in front of the Vadamarachchi bus stand.
The protest was carried out in the Sri Lanka Tamil National Alliance (TNA) at 7 pm last night.

The General Secretary of the Tamil National Alliance (TNA), headed by President Attorney MA Sumanthiran, was attended by many members of the local government councils, members and members of the party.. (A)
